equipped.name: (the ansi color book of fiery yay)

object.name: (a statue of Daroowise the high druid.)

MOB.long_description: Bigby walks around behind the counter, muttering powerful incantations.
MOB.description: Bigby looks to be very old, but he is far from senile.  The raw magical power that emanates from him is almost frightening, but he seems to be somewhat less than concerned by the likes of you.  Best to not make him notice you - just buy what you came in for and then leave him alone.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBASH, PEACEFUL, NO_CLASS_AI

MOB.long_description: Helena smiles brightly at you as she prepares another batch of donuts.
MOB.description: A bright happy woman. She looks like she's found her calling and one taste of her donuts should be enough to prove it to you too! She may be a baker now, but her weathered skin and excellent body tone reveal her tougher side.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, HELPER, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBASH, PEACEFUL, PEACEKEEPER

MOB.long_description: Aaron stands behind his counter, smiling warmly.
MOB.description: A large grocer. Aaron looks like he could sell you a mountain, then deliver it to you personally!
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, HELPER, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOBASH, PEACEFUL, PEACEKEEPER

MOB.long_description: Santiago walks confidently about his shop, master of every weapon he sells.
MOB.description: A seasoned weaponsmith and warrior. Santiago has obviously seen more battles in his life than you have seen days in yours. His obvious skill with the weapons he sells make his confidence understandable. You would be well advised to not even THINK about messing with this man!
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBASH, PEACEFUL

MOB.long_description: Beowyn stands here, polishing the many fine armours he has for sale.
MOB.description: An aging, but extremely powerful armourer and warrior. Beowyn has built mighty muscles from a lifetime of adventure and hard work. He looks friendly, as long as you're friendly. You probably don't want to get on his bad side. It looks like he has a long memory.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, HELPER, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBASH, PEACEFUL, PEACEKEEPER

MOB.long_description: A pretty half-elven receptionist shows patrons to their rooms.
MOB.description: She is very young, still a teenager, with long light brown hair and light green eyes. She has a very competent air about her.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, MEMORY, NOSLEEP, NOBASH, NOVICIOUS

MOB.long_description: Lisa is walking around here, rearranging her many leather wares.
MOB.description: Still young, Lisa has that air of confidence about her that you just can't argue with. Perhaps that's why she gave up adventuring to start her own business. She's obviously very successful.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, HELPER, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBASH, PEACEFUL, PEACEKEEPER

MOB.long_description: Granite stands here, straightening up his shields for sale.
MOB.description: Short, wide, and very muscular, Granite is definately not someone you should mess with. One look at his warm smile, however, is enough to convince you that he is a friendly person. One look around his shop should be enough to convince you he knows what he's doing.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBASH, PEACEFUL

MOB.long_description: Drako stands here, polishing his many fine bronze armours.
MOB.description: Drako is a young, aspiring armourer. Although new to his profession, his talent is readily apparent. Some day he may even match Beowyn's skills in armoury. Today, however, Drako is content to manufacture many fine inexpensive bronze armours and build a customer base.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBASH, PEACEFUL

MOB.long_description: Shauna stands here, proudly setting up her many fine iron armours.
MOB.description: Shauna is an old stick-in-the-mud type of person. You can tell she's very set in her ways. She's one of those people who believes that the old methods are still the best, and always will be. Her gruff manner doesn't exactly give you a warm, fuzzy feeling either.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBASH, PEACEFUL

MOB.long_description: A beautiful woman stands behind one of the counters, aiding patrons.
MOB.description: She is a lovely woman, with long blonde hair and a gentle smile. Always polite and charming, she aids people who walk into the shop, helping them find what they need -- or just convincing them that they do, indeed need something.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBASH, PEACEFUL

MOB.long_description: Jorhan is here, cleaning up around his animals.
MOB.description: Jorhan is a tall, slender man in the middle of his life.  He has a clean, sharp appearance to him, and a clean bill of health from his looks.  His brown hair is parted to the side, making his black eyes sparkle.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, STAY_ZONE, MEMORY, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBLIND, PEACEFUL

MOB.long_description: A beautiful, vibrant, young woman is here, petting some animals.
MOB.description: Kayla is somewhat short by normal human standards, but is sweet and caring with her animals.  Her hair flows down along her shoulders, brushing lightly at the hem of her skirt.  She seems to be in her upper twenties, but younger at heart.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, STAY_ZONE, MEMORY, HELPER, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBASH, PEACEFUL, PEACEKEEPER

MOB.long_description: Bigby's research assistant attends some scrolls.
MOB.description: He is a young, passionate-looking mage with a short-cropped black beard and an elaborate, three-cornered hat.  His robes show that he is a wizard of advanced learning, and his position as assistant to the mighty Bigby is proof of this. His features, pale from a lack of sunlight, are worried as he rummages through some scrolls.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, NOSUMMON, PEACEFUL, NO_CLASS_AI

MOB.long_description: An attendant dressed in plain robes stands by.
MOB.description: A pleasant young man stands here, apparently hired to watch over the room. His head is shaven and he wears entirely simple white linen clothing: a tunic and trousers.  He seems rather thin, but not undernourished.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, HELPER, PEACEKEEPER

MOB.long_description: Erasmus sits by the fire gazing attentively at the flames.
MOB.description: This man is dressed like the room he is in: lightly, but with dark accents. Blood-red hems adorn his robe, which is generally white or cream-colored.  He is old, with white hair that is cut fairly short and combed back over the top of his head.  His large, sunken blue eyes appear steady and studious.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOSILENCE, TEACHER, PEACEFUL, NO_CLASS_AI

MOB.long_description: The Archmage studies a book.
MOB.description: Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the vast amount of knowledge she posesses.  She is wearing fine magic clothing, and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, MEMORY, NOSUMMON, TEACHER, NO_CLASS_AI

MOB.long_description: The High Priestess, your guildmaster, is standing here.
MOB.description: You are in no doubt that the High Priestess is truly close to Mielikki; she has a peaceful, loving look, as if she were truly one with nature.  She is standing here, waiting to assist you.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, MEMORY

MOB.long_description: The Master Rogue, your guildmaster, is standing here.
MOB.description: You realize that whenever the Master Rogue moves, you fail to notice it - the way of a true rogue.  He is dressed in poor clothing, giving him the appearance of a beggar.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, MEMORY, NO_CLASS_AI

MOB.long_description: The Warrior Coach, your guildmaster, is standing here.
MOB.description: This is your master. Big and strong with bulging muscles. Several scars across his body proves that he was using arms before you were born. He has a calm look on his face.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, MEMORY, NO_CLASS_AI

MOB.long_description: A sorcerer guards the exits to the guildhalls.
MOB.description: He is an experienced mage who has specialized in the field of Combat Magic. He is here to guard the Mage's Guild and his superior knowledge of offensive as well as defensive spells make him a deadly opponent.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, NOSUMMON, PEACEFUL, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: The Holy Templar Magistrate rests here, studying some papers.
MOB.description: He is a specially trained warrior belonging to the military order of the Faith. His duty is to protect the faithful from persecution and infidel attacks and his religious devotion combined with his superior skill makes him a deadly opponent.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, NOSUMMON, PEACEFUL, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: A well-built Rogue is guarding the entrance.
MOB.description: This rogue has specialized in killing others as quickly and as effectively as possible, with all types of weapons.  His superior knowledge of how and where to use them combined with his extraordinary stealth make him a deadly opponent.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, PEACEFUL, NO_CLASS_AI, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: The Mighty Knight is guarding this entrance.
MOB.description: He is an expert warrior who has attained knighthood through countless chivalrous deeds.  His duty is to protect the Guild of Swordsmen and his extreme skill combined with his experience in warfare makes him a deadly opponent.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, PEACEFUL

MOB.long_description: A shady looking man in a long black trenchcoat stands in the darkest corner of the alley.
MOB.description: Dressed for the weather, it is clear that this man has no business but that of the most vile sort.  Though he stands as still as a tree himself, his eyes betray the true hunter inside.  Everywhere there is light there is darkness. And this man is the proof that evil lurks in the shadows.  Even to the untrained eye, he is obviously of the type you don't cross.  Hopefully your business with him will be brief.  It is doubtful that he will pay attention to you anyways unless he has business with you.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC

MOB.long_description: A bartender wipes down the bar.
MOB.description: He's a young and chipper half-elf with long, wavy amber hair and bright green eyes.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBASH, NOVICIOUS, PEACEFUL

MOB.long_description: Morgen stands behind the bar, jovial and eager to serve customers.
MOB.description: Morgen has plump cheeks and a round pot belly, looking quite jovial and friendly.  As a bartender, he likes to keep his customers happy, but it looks as though he has been having his share of the stores too.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBASH, PEACEFUL

MOB.long_description: test dragon
MOB.description: dragon
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC

MOB.long_description: A tall elven guard watches over the crowd.
MOB.description: He's an extremely dangerous looking elf with a lordly expression.
MOB.mob_flags: SCAVENGER, ISNPC, AWARE, STAY_ZONE, MEMORY, SLOW_TRACK, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: A half-elven guard in full armor strides through the crowd.
MOB.description: He's half-elven, with long hair and bright eyes. He bears numerous scars from old battles, and his expression is lofty as he surveys the crowd around him.
MOB.mob_flags: SCAVENGER, ISNPC, AWARE, STAY_ZONE, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: A young half-elven guard surveys the crowd.
MOB.description: Though he's young, he seems enthusiastic. Clearly not an elf, his features are too find and delicate to be fully human.
MOB.mob_flags: SCAVENGER, ISNPC, AWARE, STAY_ZONE, MEMORY, HELPER, FAST_TRACK, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: The High Druid stands near her favorite tree.
MOB.description: You are in no doubt that the High Druid is truly close to Mielikki; she has that peaceful, loving look, as if she were truly one with nature.  She is resting here peacefully reading a book.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, SCAVENGER, ISNPC, MEMORY, NOVICIOUS

MOB.long_description: A quiet knight in burnished gray armor watches you.
MOB.description: The eyes of this knight cannot be seen within the burnished, gray steel helm. It stands relaxed, obviously tracking your movements, yet without apparent concern.  It appears to be guarding something.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: A mysterious and dangerous-looking druid wearing a guard's tabard stands here.
MOB.description: He is one of the elven guardians of the village, but he has an air of mystery and ominous deadliness about him that few elves possess. Tattoos on his skin mark him as a druid.
MOB.mob_flags: SCAVENGER, ISNPC, AWARE, STAY_ZONE, MEMORY, SLOW_TRACK, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: A deadly-looking druid in guard's armor watches over his surroundings.
MOB.description: He is an elf, tall and proud, but with an air of serenity and ominous deadliness that few elves possess.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, SCAVENGER, ISNPC, AWARE, STAY_ZONE, MEMORY, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: A footman patrols the streets.
MOB.description: This human is of average height and weight, and not very well armored. Still, he has some scars on him, and walks like a fairly experienced warrior.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC, AWARE, STAY_ZONE, WIMPY, MEMORY, SLOW_TRACK, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: A peasant guard stands here.
MOB.description: The peasant guard might not look very bright, but he's big and strong, and looks to be very trustworthy.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC, AWARE, STAY_ZONE, WIMPY, MEMORY, SLOW_TRACK, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.
MOB.description: This little gnome is short and wrinkled, with a greenish cast to his skin. He mumbles to himself while he slowly tidies up wherever he goes.
MOB.mob_flags: SCAVENGER, ISNPC, STAY_ZONE, MEMORY, SLOW_TRACK

MOB.long_description: A stray dog sniffs for food.
MOB.description: This dog has a long coat of fur that might be white under all the dirt. He has a friendly, goofy expression, expressive brown eyes, and a pink tongue that always seems to be lolling.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC, STAY_ZONE, WIMPY, MEMORY, SLOW_TRACK

MOB.long_description: A happy drunk staggers past.
MOB.description: This fellow looks terribly happy. He staggers around from time to time, loudly proclaiming the virtues of whatever it is that's on his mind. He is of indeterminate age, and of average build.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC, WIMPY

MOB.long_description: A beggar is here, asking for a few coins.
MOB.description: He is on the older side of indeterminate, with a careworn face and a nearly toothless smile that he rarely displays. He is dressed in shapeless, filthy rags.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC

MOB.long_description: A snarling cur growls and backs away from you.
MOB.description: It is a small and thoroughly disreputable creature, with sandy-yellow fur that is quite dirty and yellowed teeth that it exposes constantly.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC, WIMPY

MOB.long_description: A gate guard is standing here, guarding the town's entrance.
MOB.description: A veteran of the common guard, this guard seems to be enjoying his prestigious position as guardian of one of the town's many entrances. His warrior skills make him ideal for the job.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, STAY_ZONE, MEMORY, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: An oozing green gelatinous blob is here, sucking in bits of debris.
MOB.description: A horrid looking thing; it's huge, greenish, and looks like the blob.
MOB.mob_flags: SPEC, SCAVENGER, ISNPC, WIMPY

MOB.long_description: A quiet guard stands near the door.
MOB.description: He's a fairly young human, with a few scars to show he's seen a few fights. He has expressive blue eyes, but doesn't talk much, preferring to do his job properly.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, MEMORY, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, PEACEFUL

MOB.long_description: The Elite Black Mage wanders around mumbling strange noises.
MOB.description: The mage looks old and decrepit, yet he seems to be a wise old man content to let others be.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC, AWARE, STAY_ZONE, WIMPY, MEMORY, FAST_TRACK, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: A cloaked figure leans on a signpost.
MOB.description: A tall, slender elf leans gently on a signpost.  His skin is tanned, and although still incredibly smooth it is starting to show signs of wear from the sun.  The smell of saltwater still hangs heavily about the cloaked ranger as he gazes around with an appraising eye.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, MEMORY, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBLIND, NOSILENCE, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: A sleek mare stands tall above the rest.
MOB.description: A slender and powerful horse looks back at you.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC, MOUNTABLE

MOB.long_description: A kitten is here.
MOB.description: The Kitten looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC

MOB.long_description: A loyal puppy is here.
MOB.description: The puppy looks like a cute little fierce fighter.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC

MOB.long_description: A loyal beagle is here.
MOB.description: Though not large, this dog looks like a loyal and fierce fighter.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC

MOB.long_description: A loyal rottweiler is here.
MOB.description: The rottweiler looks like a strong, fierce fighter.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC

MOB.long_description: A trained wolf is here.
MOB.description: The Wolf looks like a strong, fearless fighter.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC, MOUNTABLE

MOB.long_description: The postmaster stands here, looking rather bored.
MOB.description: The postmaster appears to be old, bored, and always on the verge of dozing off. Still, he looks like he could drown you in a sea of red tape, so perhaps you'd better be nice to him.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, NOSUMMON, PEACEFUL

MOB.long_description: A fussy little gnome sits behind the counter.
MOB.description: He is well-dressed and well-groomed, making him look almost comical. Wrinkled, short, overweight, and slightly green in skin color, he has a large round red nose and beady little eyes. His voice is quavery, but his tone commanding.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, PEACEFUL

MOB.long_description: A maid waits on tables.
MOB.description: She is very beautiful with golden hair, and deep blue eyes.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, NOCHARM, NOSUMMON, NOSLEEP, NOBASH, NOVICIOUS, PEACEFUL

MOB.long_description: A peasant guard is here, dunking his donut in a cup of coffee.
MOB.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard who probably likes Helena's delicious jelly donuts a lot more than the likes of you!
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, STAY_ZONE, PEACEKEEPER, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: A skinny gray donkey hems and haws here, nibbling something on the ground.
MOB.description: The donkey's hair is patchy, and not completely even, a large rowdy mane growing out of the backside of its neck.  Two long, pointy ears sticking out of its head and large teeth edging out of its mouth give it a funny-looking grin. It hops around on all legs, full of energy, but quite spunky.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC, NOSUMMON, MOUNTABLE, NOVICIOUS

MOB.long_description: A rainbow-feathered bird sits here calmly preening.
MOB.description: With a long, flattened face a short beak, this parrot looks rather comical in its outfit of rainbow-colored feathers.  The feathers covering its head are a bright red, fading to a sunny yellow around its midsection.  Its belly feathers are a soothing green, and some of the feathers along its tail are a bright blue.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC

MOB.long_description: The nasty sewer monster lurks here.
MOB.description: It sure looks like something out of a movie.  It strongly resembles a huge figure made up from mud alone, and it sure looks like it had human flesh for breakfast and is strongly intent on having the same for dinner.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC

MOB.long_description: The small bat is hanging from the ceiling.
MOB.description: You have never in your entire life seen such a mean looking small creature. The bat rather peaceful, hanging there.  The thought of arousing this evil looking creature doesn't seem appealing.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC

MOB.long_description: A small maggot wiggles here.
MOB.description: The maggot appears to be dormant its tiny belly seems to be full.  The maggot looks like it could do some serious damage, better to leave it alone.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC

MOB.long_description: An abominable slime creature lurks here.
MOB.description: Towering in front of you is a huge abominable slime creature.  Its skin is a deep dark green, slime covering its entire body.  The creature glares at you with his cold black eyes watching your every movement.  It smells as if the creature just took a bath in feces.  Behind him is an extremely long and slippery slime trail.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, STAY_ZONE

MOB.long_description: The Mayor is walking around spreading rumors.
MOB.description: He is a stocky, middle-aged man with thin, grey hair.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC, MEMORY

MOB.long_description: Freddy smiles, playing with a finger puzzle and looking quite friendly.
MOB.description: Red-haired, freckled, and wearing oversized overalls, it looks like Freddy has never grown up.  He smiles at all who enter his shop, especially excited to see little girls and boys.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, WIMPY, NOSUMMON, PEACEFUL

MOB.long_description: Julk the mercenary trainer leans against the wall, looking for new clients.
MOB.description: Though he comes only halfway up the doorframe, this halfling almost resembles a dwarf, with his deep chest, and square shoulders.  With one hand, he tosses a dagger, catching it by the blade to pass the time.  With the other hand, he keeps a light hand on his purse.  He's always on the lookout for opportunities to add to it.  Perhaps he has something to offer you..
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, MEMORY, HELPER, NOSUMMON, NO_CLASS_AI

MOB.long_description: Barely noticable, a slender, strong halfling woman assists Julk with his business.
MOB.description: You might have not toticed her at all, she draws no attention to herself. However, upon closer inspection, you see she is not shy, but confident and deliberate in every move she makes.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, HELPER, NOSUMMON, PROTECTOR

MOB.long_description: An experienced old warrior is training town guards and adventurers alike.
MOB.description: Calken's dwarven beard is almost entirely grey, leaving only a trace of it's youthful red.  He is shorter than any human in the room, but from the width of his shoulders and the depth of his chest, you imagine he is as strong as half of them combined.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, HELPER, NOSUMMON

MOB.long_description: Fecil is here conjuring an elemental for his pupil to engage.
MOB.description: Fecil is standing here twirling his long twisted black hair, pale skin stretched across his tall boney frame.  He seems to have a mischevious and creepy essence about him.  He talks in a low whisper in a crackely voice fit for a man of old age.  How old is this man?  Has he somehow prolonged his life using magic or is he an un-aging man?
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, AWARE, NOSUMMON, NOBASH

MOB.long_description: An elderly man sits at the corner of the pool, staring curiously at his reflection.
MOB.description: This man appears to be confused by the reflection he sees in the pool.  He sits there muttering something about the fountain's healing powers.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC, NOSUMMON

MOB.long_description: Rousel stands here awaiting newbies to train.
MOB.description: Rousel has rippling muscles and seems very aware of his surroundings. I don't think it would be a good idea to attack him.
MOB.mob_flags: ISNPC

MOB.long_description: The Lord of Flames, your guildmaster, is standing here.
MOB.description: As you look up into the eyes of your guildmaster, you begin to feel your body getting hotter and hotter.  This man has harnessed all of the skills that can be attainted through fire and is a very deadly opponent.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, MEMORY, HELPER, NOSUMMON, TEACHER, NO_CLASS_AI, PEACEKEEPER

MOB.long_description: The High Cryomancer, your guildmaster, is standing here.
MOB.description: This man has clearly been practicing with water for many years.  As he walks around the room, it seems as if he were sliding on a sheet of ice.  He moves about and acts without the use of any energy, this cryomancer is very dangerous.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, MEMORY, NOSUMMON, TEACHER, NO_CLASS_AI

MOB.long_description: Zeno the Priest, your guildmaster, is standing here.
MOB.description: He stands here at attention, waiting to assist all who enter.  He has been a faithful priest and gets joy from assisting others.  He has just recently given up preaching to assist all those who wish to enter the faith.
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, MEMORY, HELPER, NOSUMMON, TEACHER, PEACEKEEPER

MOB.long_description: The code is here, jeering and smirking at you.
MOB.description: This is the code.  Beware it says, least you be sucked in to my web of global variables, buffer overflows and endless loops.  No-one escapes my Power!
MOB.mob_flags: SENTINEL, ISNPC, WIMPY, MEMORY, NOCHARM, NOSLEEP, NOBLIND, FAST_TRACK, NOSILENCE

extra_descriptions.desc: The barrel looks like it could hold large amounts of beer. There is something written on the side of the barrel.
It says: Only real warriors drink beer and fight!
It looks like a beer bottle.
The ale looks finely brewed and rather strong. The smell of the ale is so strong it almost knocks you off your feet.
This bottle has a warning label.
The label reads: This drink is only for the brave and strong stomached!
Whatever is inside this bottle is made in the local tavern, and smells good.
This barrel looks like it would be good to hold large amounts of water.
The ring is simple, yet elegant in its beauty. It is a symbol of the eternal life, and the eternal love, shared by a joyous couple.

Standing approximately ten feet tall, the altar is a living sculpture of the beautiful goddess of nature herself. Her beauty is awe-inspiring. The sculpture consists of living vines, bushes, flowering plants, and several small trees, all intertwined. A tiny plaque of white metal rests against her foot.
Inscribed into the plaque are the words "Touch the goddess to mark your sanctuary."
This bread feels freshly made. In fact, it's still warm...it must have just came out of the oven.
It's the biggest jelly donut you've ever seen! It smells so fresh and yummy!
The donut looks freshly made from the bakery. Mmmm...cream filling...
The donut smells like it was freshly baked at the bakery. It has a sugar glaze on its warm browned surface.
It looks like a fresh pastry from the bakery. Looking at the chocolate frosting causes you to drool a little.
This beautiful gown has a low sweetheart neckline and a flowing skirt attached to a v-shaped waistline. The sleeves are almost transparent, caught at the wrists in cuffs.
This fine circlet is just a plain circle around the brow, but the quality of the silver, and its shine, make it look far more opulent than it really is.
These shoes are made of thick, sturdy heavyweight silk, and they are perfect for wearing with a dress.
This is a plain wedding ring, polished to a sheen and quite comfortable.
This golden ring has a large, flawless diamond setting. The diamond looks like a spark of blue-white fire, and it catches any light in a pleasing fashion.
The dagger's blade is razor sharp.
The sword is rather small to be called a sword, but it's definitely bigger than a dagger. It's rather simple in design.
The sword is about three and a half feet in length, and the blade is very sharp. It's plain and undecorated, allowing its steel to speak for itself.
You see a short wooden club. You'd imagine it would hurt if you hit someone or something over the head with it.
Looking at the warhammer brings out your native spirits.
The flail is a nice, easy to use weapon, for people who weren't trained in the art of sword fighting.

This is a small, wooden carving in the shape of a totem.  There are many figures represented upon the wood.  One is that of a ragged old man, who seems to be surrounded by five assistants of a notable status.  The base of the totem is charred and looks as though it has been exposed to fire.
The torch is simple in its design. It's made up of a piece of wood with some cloth wrapped around the top of it, and smells like it has been dipped in oil.
The oil lantern is made of brass, and has a handle to make it easier to hold. Some words have been carved into the bottom of the lantern.
The words read: Type "light lantern" to activate.
The bag is rather small, but looks as if you could put a few of your personal possesions into it. A small label is sewn into the bag.
It reads: Aaron's Fine Haberdashery Equipping Mielikki's Bravest Souls since 201 To use this bag, type put <object> bag To remove objects from this bag, type get <object> bag
The mayor's cane is simply a short piece of wood to help him with walking in his old age.  It is probably worthless otherwise.
The deep, rich red ruby is mounted on a silver cabuchon setting. It seems to glow with inner light.
This coat is made of fine black leather and covers the wearer from the shoulders down to the calf muscles.

The scroll appears to have some strange language written on it: IDENT IXIA  LOIDE NT  X IAFLO IDENT IX AF LOIDE  TIA  IAFLO I     IXIAF E   I  AF LO    N I X   F     E    XIA    I   N   X I     I     I   F E   I  AF LOID  N I X   F     E     I     I   NTIAX IAF   I     I   F E   I  AF LO    N I X   F     E    XIA    I   N   X I     I     I   F IDENT IXIA  LOIDE N  AX   F   IDENT IX AF LOIDE N   X I     IDENT IXIAF
The potion has a small label 'Detect Invisible'.
The scroll has written upon it a formula for 'Word of Recall'. The thick parchment paper is, strangely, coloured a rich green.
The staff is made of metals unknown to you.
The raft looks very primitive, but appears to be safe enough to use.
The canoe is fairly light.
This carpet is a very finely woven thick rug. It looks...relatively safe...

Constructed of quality linen from a loom, the dress is designed to fit a medium-sized woman of average build.  A rich blend of common broom and whin bark have been used to dye the dress a bright green, emitting the soft musky odor of nature.
The simple green ribbon is haphazardly cut into a small strip of linen.  It serves its purpose well, however, and may even be quite attractive fixed up in a young lady's hair.

Mielikki, the forest town, by Kara-Sithri ***KEY*** gate         altar                          |SB: sleepy blvd. |             |                            |PO: post office SB     *1-temple ?      shop-NCA           |SQ: smelter's sq. |             |  |           |             |WM: west main SB        TC-TC-TC           NCA-shop      |TC: town center |         |  |  |            |             |fn: fountain Inn-SB-PO     TC-fn-TC  shop-*2  NCA-shop      |EM: east main |         |  |  |    |       |             |CS: commerce sq gate-SQ---WM---WM---TC-TC-TC---EM--EM--CS---EM-gate  |NCA: no. commerce |          |   |     |            |             |SCA: so. commerce shop-SR-shop shop shop-*3 da-da-da     SCA           |da: dark alley |          |            |  |      |             |tav: tavern shop-SR-shop   *4          tav dump    SCA-shop      |SR: smelter's row |                                 |             |NCP: new castle plaza NCP--NC--NC--NC--NC--NC--NC--NC---NCS            |NC: new castle rd. |                        |                  |NCS: new castle sq. RP-RP-RP                    WW                 |WW: windy way |  |  |                     |                  |RP: royal plaza TYPE LOOK SIDE2 TO SEE THE REST OF THE MAP

|  |  |                     |                  |RP: royal plaza RP-fn-RP                    WW-haunted         |*1: cleric/druid gld |  |  |                     |   house          |*2: warrior guild RP-RP-RP                    WW                 |*3: rogue guild |                        |                  |*4: mage guild *5                       gate                |*5: paladin guild
It looks like a brandy bottle.
It's a white ceramic mug that looks perfect for a serving of cappuccino.
Use "look desk" to see a listing of the archived messages. Use "read <message number>" to read a message.
Use "look board" to see a listing of the messages. Use "read <message number>" or "remove <message number>" to read or remove a message, respectively.  Use "write board <subject>" to post.
It is a small simple cup, with a unique floral design.
It is a small simple cup, made to keep your coffee warm till the last drop.
It is a large simple cup.

The sweet aroma of almond wafts up from a delicious-looking donut. Semicircular with notches on the straight edge, the donut resembles a bear claw.  Almond flakes and raisins are sprinkled on the top.
Gravy is poured over tasty-looking sausages and a lump of mashed potatoes. The sausages appear to be beef, seasoned with a variety of herbs and onions.
A small pile of fried potato crisps lies on a piece of whitish paper, dripping with oil and covered in savory-smelling seasonings.  It looks quite tasty.
Shelled, boiled, and pickled, these eggs are slightly discoloured, filled with the scent of vinegar and beets.
Made from freshly-baked rye bread, this sandwich has a thin slice of turkey smothered in delicious-smelling sauce.  It is topped with a few leaves of lettuce and slices of tomato.

Sewn primarily from a large pig's bladder, this ball measures slightly larger than a human's head.  It is inflated and tied off, preventing the air within from escaping.  The outer surface has been cleaned and leatherized, making this a tough ball useful for the roughest sports.

This little plushie is a bright green, dyed with sweet-smelling green screwpine, making it an expensive little toy.  Sewn from soft strips of canvas and stuffed with cotton or wool, the cute little dragon is quite huggable with a cute little grin on its cute little face.

A large motherly-looking ostrich greets the reader of this book, sitting jovially in the middle of the top of the book.  The cover's title reads: Mother Ostrich's Nursery Rhymes - First Edition.  Several pages of friendly children's poems follow within, starting on page1.
Hey! diddle, diddle, The child wrote a scribble, The sun hopped over the stream; The big dragon laughed petting his gems, And the teapot began to steam! The nursery rhymes continue on page2.

Wug the Fi'ry Drakling, lived in the fields And frolicked with the tomatoes 'til he got bashed down with shields! Little newbies always killed that rascal Wug And brought him hell and suffering and crushed him like a bug! The nursery rhymes continue on page3.

There once was a rogue from Mielikki Who told all his friends he was sneaky So he went to a cave And was feeling quite brave But now Mysa has a new toy rogue squeaky The nursery rhymes continue on page4.
Glug and Gwill went up the hill To burn a human city. Glug fell down not far from the town And Gwill wrote this little ditty. The nursery rhymes continue on page5.
Little Mage Bigby sat in the corner, Hoping he wouldn't be missed. He cast with his hand a spell oh so grand, And thus we have Bigby's Clenched Fist. The nursery rhymes continue on page6.
Cast, cast, cast the spell, Quickly and with skill. Daintily, cautiously, gracefully, carefully, Magic's but a drill. The nursery rhymes continue on page7.
It'sa pixie time They steals the sticks-y twine A little mouse Caught in a house Now he's pickled in brine! The nursery rhymes continue on page8.
Take their ears Pee in their beers It's all in fun Now sing of their fears
Shaped like a tiny bluejay, this whistle is carved from a single block of wood. It is hollowed out inside, and a tiny flap in the beak vibrates when the whistle is blown, making a twittering whistle.
Woven from tight strips of Odaishyozen bamboo, this slender cylinder has openings on either end large enough to place a finger inside.
This large canvas bag is filled with a solid 25 pounds of XXXX flour.  It's not very tasty, but with a little water might be palatable.
Well-oiled and heavily-seasoned, this plate of spiced potatoes wafts steam into the air, still hot from the frying pan.  It smells simply delicious.

Twinkling in the light like a halo of blue fire, the sapphires on this bracelet are linked together by a thin chain of beautifully polished silver.  Each sapphire is mounted in a small silver rectangle, following the chain around in a circle.  The sapphire quality is exquisite, flawlessly reflecting a brilliant bright blue color.

The plushie doll looks just like the great Overlord himself!  Althought cute and cuddly, the plushie seems to have an air of authority about it.  It even seems to question 'Done yet?  ' at its imaginary underlings...  Or perhaps that's your imagination?

No matter how much light is shone on this female doll, it remains wreathed in shadow, the tiny delicate features difficult to make out.  Despite its small stature, power seems to emanate from its body, and its decoration is very real and lifelike.  The figurine is dressed in a extraordinarily detailed jet-black kimono concealing a little button in the figure's back.
An old claw beginning to rust has a fresh coat of slime on it.  The stench from the claws is enough to kill a person.

Reminiscent of a miniature halfling, this soft felt puppet fits snugly over one hand, and is created from soft multicolored felt.  It has a mischievous grin stitched on its face, with black glass eyes peering out from a black cloth helm.  Oddly, the halfling has two little spiky canines protruding from its mouth.  Perhaps the puppet was meant to scare little children?

The little doll is sewn together from scraps of cloth.  Facial features are stitched carefully on the head, depicting a mischevious smile.  Something about the doll just makes you want to pat it on the head!  A hooded cloak made of brown felt fits the doll nicely, covering the seams where the arms are attached.  Each arm has an odd little sword sewn on--the hilts are metallic, but the blades are a strange glowing material.  The swords' glow slowly alternates between subtle brightening and dimming, casting varying shadows on the doll's face which seem to make its eyes come alive.
The safe is very heavy.

OBJECT.action_description: Looks like a whole lot of coins has been dropped here.

extra_descriptions.desc: Looks like a whole lot of coins to you.
It's a small pile of coins.

In the center of the fountain is a statue of Metamorpho, "Weaver of the Worlds." The statue's arms are extended toward the heavens, and water shoots out from its hands over the top of the statue's head. There is an inscription on the side of the fountain.
Inscribed on the side it says "Metamorpho circa 1992".
The fragile glass of this small bottle blends seamlessly with the oily contents within.  A yellow chalk inscription is nearly worn off.  Its remainder reads: "dark pr..."

Even smaller than the tiny forest brownies, this squishy little doll looks roughly like its fairy namesake.  Somehow it retains a mischievous glint in its little candy eyes that tells you SOMETHING is up.
Crudely sewn from animal fur, this little Meer Cat is very cute and cuddly nonetheless.  It has the softest, fuzziest fur and has a friendly look upon its tiny face.
Much like a real Hiver, this little replica has a crystal-clear chitin shell, sparkling gracefully in the light.  She has six little round feet and looks like a diligent, caring worker.

Formed from some mysterious translucent material, this pretty little pixie doll shimmers golden and blue in color.  Tiny wire-frammed silk wings project from the doll's back.  Some blue and gold glitter is attached to the doll, scattered to look like sparks racing across her skin.

This little avian doll is covered in actual rich, deep red feathers from a rosella.  Its beauty could easily be mistaken for a blossoming flower, albeit a flower with a large wooden hookbill.  Little wooden feet stick out of the bottom, but don't seem to serve very well for balance, as the doll has trouble standing up.

This little bald doll resembles a slightly older man, dressed in a little grey cloth shirt, miniature grey canvas pants, and some tiny reed sandals.  He holds a small polished black wand in his hand, pointing it aggressively at some unknown foe.

This little stone flask is a perfect sculpture of a stony golem, save the little stopper protruding from the top of its head.  Its hollow stone eyes chillingly reflect no emotions or remorse...  Though that would seem to be normal from such an inanimate object as this.

The doll is a horrid looking thing: it's little, greenish, and looks like the blob.  Under the globs of gelatinous gleaming gunk, glint the green eyes of a gooey effigy.  Its original visage is difficult to make out, because of all the green gelatin caked on it.  The goo is quite sticky, causing anything touching it to become lodged in the mess.

Short and stout, this little Larva Worm doll is sewn from pieces of tough white leather of unknown origin.  It's stuffed unevenly with thick clumpy wool and its white skin is discolored, giving it a sickly appearance.  Its red bead eyes glare menacingly, evil intentions in its eyes.

This slender-legged, bright white doll has a look of nobility in its well-crafted stitches.  Clumps of stuffing ripple under its skin and its underlying wire frame allows the doll to stand on its four little legs with grace and assuredness.
This little doll is made from a light blue hide, and has a cute little red tongue hanging out of its open mouth.  It has little floppy wings attached to its back.

This little doll has a glossy black hide, its shiny scales probably taken from a snake or other small reptile.  Little felt flames flare from its nostrils, burning the imaginary miniature townspeople around it.
This little doll has vibrant green skin and wings, its little beady eyes projecting an unnatural aura about itself.  Drawing miniature little newbies to their deaths.
This little doll is voracious-looking, with a full mouth of razor-sharp felt teeth.  It has a hungry look on its tiny face, ready to chomp on the next little newbie to pass by.
Though the cutest baby roc doll ever, this hatchling looks vicious at the same time.  It's armed with a hooked beak and claws carved from wood.  The beak is open wide in a hungry silent squawk.

A mass of vines and vegetation, the doll has loose wriggling roots stretching out from its body in random directions.  It's crafted from various samples of underbrush and bound together with strong vegetable cords, with a shape vaguely resembling a human.

Modeled after the famous mercenary women of the north, this little Amazon doll is dressed in tiny replicas of battle armor and weaponry.  She sports a tough mohawk haircut, and carefully sewn stitches recreate stylish wounds and scars scattered across her cloth skin.

Apparently crafted using the thin bones of a chicken, they have been rearranged into a humanoid form and robed in ragged garments.  In an effort to make the Heucuva replica more authentic, it has apparently been perfumed in the odor of rotting flesh.

The doll has an permanent irritated look stitched on its face.  His proportions would make him seem quite large and muscular for an orc, and his uniform bears resemblance to an actual general's outfit.  He has little yellow beady eyes that would seem to be more interested in pillaging than the average doll.
The doll resembles a wise, learned man who has many years of education.  He has itty-bitty spectacles that would probably break under the smallest amount of pressure.

Crafted in the image of Mesmeriz himself, this trollish doll has rough green skin painted with purple and red symbols.  True to form, one horn curls back as a ram, but the other is broken off near his head.  Even as a doll, he seems dangerous.

Mammoths are gigantic elephants covered in thick wooly hair.  Although not gigantic, this doll is fairly true to form, with thick brownish wool covering its body.  It has two little pale wooden curved tusks, which are really the only danger to this cute, cuddly mammoth.

This doll is very beautiful and seems very elegant crafted from soft cloth. Resembling a Technitzitlan Shaman, she is dressed in fine flowing robes and a cute little Snow Leopard cloak.  An upset look has been stitched upon her face, reflecting concern of some great evil powers.

Resembling the accounts of the fabled Giant Squid of the seas, this doll is one of the ugliest in existence, with no eyes to speak of and little ropes for tentacles.  A strange beak-like maw sits at the center of the tentacles, with the tip of a fountain pen protruding slightly.  The squishy sac-like body must be the ink well that allows this doll to act as a pen as well.

A beautiful little Nereid doll sits here, skillfully formed from delicate porcelain.  A chilly expression of insanity has been painted on her face, so masterfully done that it seems to contort and laugh in glee...

Only close-up is it obvious this spider is just a doll.  It has little fangs and a hairy body, with wireframe legs to keep it standing.  It's large for a spider, but is modelled after even larger forest spiders who are rarely seen by those who continue living.  Its abdomen is three times larger than its upper body, though they are all one piece, giving it a sort of pear shape.

The doll stands with a little wooden sword at his side and in full tin replica armor.  It's fairly polished, but also has scratches and dents from hours of play.  He has a stoic, concerned expression, ready at every moment to help his owner banish the evils of the world.

This soft little doll is sewn in the shape of a flame, with varying shades of red for dye.  It has two little black beads as eyes, giving it a cute harmless appearance.  When squeezed, a little burst of real flame pops out its top.

Shaped like a mostly amorphous blob, this doll is dyed almost uniformly light blue, with white crests across the top.  It completely resembles running water from rivers and oceans.  A little spigot on the back lets one pour water into and draw water out of the doll.

The demon stands at least twice as tall the average doll.  He has little stuffed muscles and a thoughtful that looks off into space.  He wears only a pair of red trousers and a little pouch, but two black horns curve back from his head, like deer antlers.
It's so teeny and cuddly!  It's so cute!  It has a tiny little beak just big enough to fit a worm or finger in!

This glowing sphere is similar to a lantern or torch, but seems to have a mind of its own, darting about at high speed and in a completely random manner. The intensity of the light changes from very bright to quite dim.  Resembling an actual will-o-wisp, the doll is carved from glass that shifts in color from blue to violet to green and back again.

This is a miniature, vortex-like mass of cloth and stuffing.  Thin strands of wool flow out in all directions.  There seems to be no pattern to it, but there are faces and scenes randomly swirled in with paint on the cloth.
The doll depicts a fairly average man, with nondescript features.  There's nothing about this doll that's memorable.

This little gnomic doll hides behind its hands, its little bead eyes peering through its fingers.  It has stubby little legs that closely resemble a real gnome's.  Dressed all in black, the gnome would be very difficult to see, say, above a darkened theater stage.

Stitches made to look as scars crisscross the muscular form of this doll.  He has a relaxed expression on his face, resting in a mysterious pool of hot water that appears wherever he sits.  On his forehead is a strange, purple tattoo.

Dressed in robes of soft blue, this little doll has a teeny black silk blindfold covering his eyes.  Its sewn to his head, and doesn't seem removeable.  A cheerful smile is depicted on his face, and an unfamiliar symbol in bright blue is on his forehead.

The doll has pliable arms and legs, not quite limp, but their position is easily changed.  Although a relaxed look is stitched onto his face, he seems to have an inexplicable alertness.  Some long scars are stitched on his back, resembling lash marks.  An unfamiliar symbol on the doll's forehead glows bright red.

Somewhat short, even for a doll, this little cloth replica is made to appear totally engrossed in her tiny book.  She looks scholarly, with thin wire "glasses" set upon her head.  A half-smirk sits on her lips and a strange yellow symbol sits on her forehead.

If the proportions of this doll can be trusted, its muse was rather tall and graceful.  She has long purple hair, hanging partially in front of her dark eyes, which have simultaneously inviting yet dangerous aspects.  A mysterious glowing blue symbol rests on her forehead.

Dressed in a red robe, this miniature doll resembles a power-hungry sorcerer. Carved from light wood, he is eternally fixed in his position, holding a miniature glass beaker in each hand.  It appears as if he is pouring one beaker into the other.  He has a maniacal grin carved onto his face, as if these very two beakers held the secret of unlimited power.

Carefully smithed from the finest bronze, this little sculpture depicts a woman of the greatest hubris.  She is fixed in a permanent position of rapture, admiring herself in a tiny mirror in her hand.  Her hair is painted red, and sprawls down across a sculpted cloak painted the same fiery red.
The sarcophagus is fantastically crafted and sculpted in the image of the pharoah Imanhotep.  The detail on this minuscule replica is unbelievable.

Summoned here either by a powerful wizard or a talented doll-maker, you wonder what foul purpose was intended in summoning this Zalkar doll.  It has magma red skin, and an evil look in its eyes.  Such a doll couldn't be intended as an agent of evil, but it could hardly be meant as a plaything for children.
Black cloth forms the skin of this demon-like doll, with bolts of blue lightning painted across its surface.  Puffs of cotton are attached, resembling a storm floating about its body.

This doll only marginally resembles the average forest deer, for it has jet black cloth for skin, and its eyes are pale red beads tied to its head.  Sharp bits of glass and hardened clay act as sharp teeth in its mouth, which seems to be stained with a thick dark-red substance...

At first glance, the little mound seems to be made of just ordinary stone. But a closer look shows it to have a vaguely humanoid shape, with arms and legs of earth, bound together by wire.  The doll's limbs bounce comically on their wires when it's handled.
This cloth doll is modeled after a middle-aged man dressed in dun-colored robes.  His crafted expression conveys wisdom and serenity, but nothing about this doll particularly demands a second look.

This doll is more beautiful than one can imagine.  It depicts a woman, her hair a shiny black, as dark as night.  The cloth for her skin is pale and she is dressed in a dusty white robe.  She has odd little wooden talons fixed to the end of her hands, looking as sharp as any sword.

This little half-elven doll has thin dark blonde straw for hair covering his little pointed ears.  A stubby beard is drawn onto the doll's face, reflecting a half-human lineage.  A thick swath of green felt forms a flowing robe which wraps his body from shoulder to knee.

This porcelain doll looks just like a samurai from Odaishyozen, but unlike a real samurai, its face is an unpainted white, and the remainder of its "skin" is covered in a skin-tone paint.  Black hair is glued to its head, tied back in a topknot.  Two miniature swords hang from its belt that encircles the doll's bulky cloth robes.

The cloth surface of this doll has many tiny folds, resembling aged wrinkled skin.  A mass of tangled hair is attached to the head, and a look of concern and panic marks his face.  The doll's arms stick out in front of him, as if fanning something.

It's odd to see one of these great beings so small, even if it is only a child's-toy representation.  The doll has a noble, reserved expression, with a knowing look in his eyes.  A little golden ball is adhered to one of his hands, and he wears a squishy white belt covered in metal glitter.

This dragon doll is truly adorable.  It is hollow yet very heavy, its surface skillfully smithed from tiny burnished overlapping silver scales.  Little crystals resembling ice are caked on its claws, as if the doll resided in a frigid environment.  Although curled up in a sleepy little ball, one of its large, glassy eyes is open, as if watching its surroundings carefully.

This fierce-looking dragon doll is small and toylike, but not terribly cute with its mottled grey reptilian hide and dull eyes.  The underbelly is a softer white fuzzy cloth, contrasting the doll's pointed metal claws, odd for a child's plaything.  A small pile of copper coins is glued together, resting under the doll's belly.

You've never seen such an adorable little doll.  It's modeled after a young girl, with almost-white flaxen hair cut to brush her itty-bitty shoulders. She has huge, exaggerated blue eyes giving her the cutest expression.  In a tiny white pullover shirt and blue overalls, this doll is an absolutely precious picture.

Crafted from black snakeskin stretched over a light wooden frame and thick wool stuffing, this little dragon doll looks very similar to a real live dragon, only magnitudes smaller.  An air of death surrounds even this small doll, and a look in its red gleaming glass eyes is as vile and black as its scales.

No ordinary doll, it has pale, translucent skin and black hair tinted slightly blue.  A silvery light seems to glow about the doll, highlighting its glittering indigo eyes.  Amusement shows in the capricious grin stitched on its face.  A tiny glass shard is clasped in the doll's right hand, pyramidal in shape and about as long as the doll's forearm.

Magnificently carved from a single piece of polished cedar wood, this little box is a delightful little container.  Five mysterious glowing symbols are imprinted on the cover, each lit a different hue.  Inside are five metal brackets each marked with a single word in an unknown language.

This little doll is wrapped tightly in linen bandages, carefully criss-crossed about its body.  The hands are wrapped in a different, darker linen, and the fingers have little gold tips on them.  A little ruby scarab is attached to the mummy's chest, a spell of protection written on its face.  Although not emaciated like the average mummy, this doll is a very realistic replica.
It looks rather strange and smells funny!
It looks somehow magical!
It's a medium sized, beautifully crafted dirk made from some greyish alloy. Its blade is double-edged and very thin...this looks like a good weapon for a thief.
It looks informative, but sometimes even looks are deceiving.
The suit of banded mail appears to be magical.
This mighty weapon is a little heavier than a sword, but it should do quite a bit more damage.
The amulet is shaped like a mushroom, and has a silver chain.
The potion is pink in color and smells like cherries.
The wand is made of pure platinum. It feels cold to the touch.
The cloak is made with some odd magical blue cloth. It keeps fading in and out of existance.
The wand is made from a silver alloy, and is painted with blue streaks. The wand sends electrical pulses through your hand.
The helmet is rather small and barely protects your head.
The ruby is red and sparkles in the sun light. It looks like it'd make a good present to give to a good friend.
The dagger has four separate blades that stem out from the handle. Each of the blades are extremely sharp and jagged shaped.
The green hat looks like it feel off a medieval archer.
The black potion smells rotten.
In the flask is an orange liquid that smells a lot like lemons.
It looks like a very sturdy hand-crafted staff made out of oak. The staff has been carved to resemble a serpent.
The ball's surface is smooth and round. The ball is made out of pure quartz, and gives off a soft light.
The scroll appeares to have something written on it, but the scroll is too worn to read.
The scroll reads: Detection sharpens perception!
The flute has been with a very fine silver alloy. Staring into the flute you can see your reflection.
As you stare at the face of the demon, it comes to life. The demon's face stares at you in the eyes and grins, then it returns to normal.
This chunk of deer looks like it was just freshly cut by the butcher of Anduin.
Some stagnant water lies in the bottom of the fountain.
This finely crafted sword is very heavy and has two handles to help you compensate for its weight while you fight with it in battle.
The black robe is made with the finest silk known to man, just holding it make you feel richer.
The cloak is the color of a dark forest green and is made out of a very heavy material. A beautiful design has been embroidered on the cloak.

It is a large and robust but somewhat battered oil lantern made from brass, and it is equipped with a handle to make it handy and a hood to protect its flame.  Some letters have been scratched on its bottom.
They say, "Use 'light lantern' to activate."
It has a nice sky blue colour and a smell like peppermint.
It has a deep yellow colour and and a strong spicy smell.
It is a heavy sceptre made from solid iron.
It is a quite heavy human-sized ring made from solid iron.  It lacks decorations of any kind.
It looks like a very fine piece of equipment capable of doing some nice damage.
A keen knife, very sharp--you could cut the air in two!
It's a hat made of blue cloth.  It looks very comfortable.
The visor is black and looks like it'd be a good piece of equipment to protect your head.
It is a broad belt made from tiny silver rings woven together.
In the flask is a transparent electric blue liquid.
The small stick does not look interesting at all.  But just as you are going to throw it away you notice some small letters.
It reads 'Hold me'.
This looks like a whole lot of coins.
This is a very nice little weapon. The blade is about two feet long and the weapon itself is rather light.
Quite a heavy weapon, with a pure white hilt.
This looks like some heavy protection, for the head of course.
You notice that there has been inscribed some runes and a sort of pattern, which resembles flames running along the edge.
On the blade you can read 'Flame And Strength United Are My Soul Power'.
It is a robust chest made from short, heavy planks that have been fastened together with tenons.  It is equipped with a simple brass lock.
The potion is magenta in color, and softly vibrates in your hand.
It reads: Sorcerers -- EAST Pyromancers -- UP Cryomancers -- DOWN
This large bush flourishes here sprouting dozens of buds which grow into large black roses. All one must do is look within its confines to obtain a rose.

OBJECT.action_description: Adorned in woodsman brown and forest green the druid's stance waivers not. Welcome to Fiery Mud! Here you will learn powerful new spells and skills that will enable you to venture ever further into this strange new world... Power and riches beyond your wildest dreams could become yours - if you have what it takes! This pamphlet will guide you along your first steps on Fiery. It is meant to keep you from making the same mistakes newbies have been making time after time. Some of this might not be new to you, other things are specific to Fiery. Here are some helpful tips to get you going, type "look <tip>": COMMANDS -> A list of helpful commands. FIGHTS   -> A brief summary over fighting. LEVELING -> A brief summary about advancing and guilds. RENTING  -> A brief summary about leaving Fiery, and misc things. RULES    -> A quick list of Fiery rules. MAP      -> A map of Mielikki. CLOSING  -> Final advice and if you have questions. NOTE: All bold words within these 5 subtopics are commands that can be typed.
Type one of the following: Look commands Look fights Look leveling Look renting Look rules Look map Look closing

Before you get started in your adventures, we ask that you do a little reading to help you understand Fiery's environment and how things work. Please be patient, reading all of this should take you less then 5 minutes. Here are a few of things we strongly advise you to read, type: HELP -> A list of all the major commands. HELP NEWBIE -> Brief newbie advice on areas to try. HELP RULES -> A listing of Fiery Mud's rules. HELP AREAS -> A list of current areas and their respective levels. HELP KILLER -> A brief warning about attacking players. HELP 100 -> A list of the limitations for immortals and gods. NEWS -> A list of all the mud's changes <Not necessary to read immediately>.

After you've read the rules, you might feel the urge to KILL something. There's a large field just outside the west gate that's pretty safe, especially if you first CONSIDER the creatures you want to kill. Killing creatures will earn you experience points, and sometimes gold. Remember that you can GET ALL from the corpse, and TAP the corpse when you're done, to tidy things up.

Try typing SCORE. When you have earned enough experience points, you will be ready to level. This is done at your guild, by typing LEVEL GAIN. It might be a good idea to visit your guild right away, for this is also the place where you can PRACTICE new skills or spells. Guilds can be found close to the town center. Monks and Rangers can level at the Warrior's Guild. All the other classes must level in their respective guilds.

Should you get hungry, there's a bakery on North Commerce Avenue.  There are also many other ways of creating and/or finding food about the realm. Currently renting at the inn is free, with a limit on 50 items per player to reduce any problems that could occur.  To view your current load you may use the offer command at the inn.  Camping is also another alternative, and can be done in any outdoors room.  It is free, and allows you to stay far away from town if you haven't completed your current adventure.  Typing QUIT is possible but NOT something you should generally do, for you will lose all of your equipment.

FieryMud has a few simple rules. For a fairly complete listing of rules, type: h rules -- but be aware that this list can change without notice. ALL PLAYERS are expected to know the rules. You should definitely read the altar board for more information, as well as the news, at some point. All players are expected to know what is contained therein!

First off we'd like to thank you for taking the time and reading this pamphlet. If you have any questions, my advice to you would be: First ->  check to see if there is a HELP file available, by typing help <keyword> Second -> type WHO and look for a higher level player, and politely ask them if they'd answer your question using the TELL command. Third ->  Ask your question politely over the GOSSIP channel, but please don't spam GOSSIP with your question over and over if you do not receive an answer. By the way, the ECHOBACK command will enable you to see what you're saying. Everything else you would want to know can be found in the HELP files - or ask your fellow players, if you're really stuck. Now, we wish you good luck! Get on the road to Immortality... Good hunting! Written by: Nocturno Last updated by: ObiWan (7/96)

wait 1 if %actor.class% /= Illusionist wsend %actor% &5You sense the magic of illusion at work upon your senses.&0 end

wait 1 s if %actor.class% /= Sorcerer smirk wait 3 s ruffle %actor.name% elseif %actor.class% /= Cryomancer || %actor.class% /= Pyromancer say Silly bun!  It's right outside! wait 3 s pat %actor.name% elseif %actor.class% /= Necromancer say Why, you're looking for creepy old Asiri! wait 2 s nod wait 3 s say I suppose he's around here somewhere.  Somewhere creepy!  I don't really know. elseif %actor.class% /= Illusionist say Oh dear.  You're asking the wrong spellcaster.  You illusionists, so good at hiding. wait 4 s say But there is one thing.  Old Eamus - Ermie?  What was his name? wait 3 s ponder wait 3 s say Well anyway, he'd always head to the bank after tea.  But he didn't go into the bank. wait 4 s say Come to think of it, you illusionists are always sneaking off to the bank.   Or not. say Oh, I'm so confused! else sigh wait 3 s say I'm so sorry, dearie, I've no earthly idea where your guild is. end

wait 1 s if %actor.class% /= Sorcerer && %actor.level% > 9 && %actor.level% < 46 say So you want to take on the dark arts, eh?  The foul arts?  The stinky death arts? wait 3 s sniff wait 3 s say I suppose there's no accounting for taste.  You might want to find a pungent necromancer to help with this endeavour.  If you absolutely must. wait 4 s say Or a diabolist, even.  Seriously.  They're all the same, painted dark purple and wearing old umbrellas. wait 4 s say Yes, there IS a necromancer nearby.  I should think the odor would have given him away to you long ago. wait 4 s say Go look around the creepy nasty parts of town.  No, NOT underground!  This is Asiri we're talking about here! say He's vain and no doubt sips blood in a musty parlour, but he won't stand for mold. wait 4 s say I suppose a run-down shack of some kind would suit him.  I've never been to visit.  Never will. elseif %actor.class% /= Sorcerer && %actor.level% < 10 say You want to know about evil, scheming death mages?  A fine young sorcerer like yourself? wait 4 s say I canNOT imagine why.  They lead frightful lives.  Entertained and served by corpses. wait 3 s shudder wait 3 s say At any rate, Asiri won't do a thing for you at your age.  So you can just put the idea out of your mind. wait 4 s say Preferably forever. elseif %actor.class% /= Necromancer msend %actor% %self.name% looks you over. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% looks %actor.name% over. wait 4 s say Indeed.  I suppose you are.  Well. wait 4 s say It can't be helped, can it?  You're... well, you're what you are, aren't you. wait 4 s say If you're looking for your guild, I can only assure you that it's nowhere nearby. wait 4 s say Well, it can't be TOO far away, as I can smell the rot of old Asiri.  It drifts over half the town. wait 3 s gag wait 3 s say Why don't you look for a few undead folks?  Asiri seems to discard as many corpses as he employs. else say You smell it, too? wait 4 s say I'm going to start a petition to have Asiri evicted from our fine town. wait 4 s say I hope I can count on you to sign promptly. wait 4 s eyebrow %actor.name% end

wait 1 s if %actor.class% /= Sorcerer && %actor.level% > 9 && %actor.level% < 46 say If you want to become an illusionist, you might want to talk to the Grand Master in the citadel. wait 3 s say Unfortunately, he has been in a foul mood of late.  He may not agree to help you.  But I know of no one else. elseif %actor.class% /= Sorcerer && %actor.level% < 10 say Illusionists?  Crafty folk, you can never be quite sure what's going on around them. wait 3 s say You could become one if you wanted, but you'll have to wait until you have achieved level 10. elseif %actor.class% /= Illusionist say Are you looking for the guild?  I hear that they place crafty illusions over the entrances.  But only visual ones... wait 3 s say They always seem to be near banks, as well.  Sorry, I don't know anything more about them. else say I always used to take along an illusionist when adventuring.  You never know when they'll come in handy! end

wait 2 s if %actor.class% /= Illusionist if %actor.skill[charm person]% == 100 say A nice spell, isn't it?  I hope you're enjoying it. elseif %actor.level% < 17 say Ah, charm person.  A powerful spell, capable of great evil - or good. wait 2 s say Come back when you have a bit more experience, and I'll teach it to you. else say Oh, the charm person spell.  You're ready to learn that one! wait 2 s say Stand still there while I teach you. wait 2 s emote launches into a marathon of lectures and speeches about diverse arcana. wait 5 s emote is still spewing forth obscure knowledge at a furious rate! wait 5 s emote seems to be winding down, as if the lesson were almost over. wait 5 s if %actor.room% == %self.room% say I'm impressed with your attentiveness, %actor.name%. wait 3 s say I can see that you've learned charm person rather well. mskillset %actor% charm person else say Eh?  Where did %actor.name% go?  Must not have a thirst for knowledge! end end elseif %actor.class% /= Sorcerer if %actor.skill[charm person]% == 100 gasp wait 3 s say What's this?  An ordinary sorcerer with charm person?! wait 5 s say Will wonders never cease! wait 5 s shake else say Don't look at me!  I'm a legendary teacher, but some things are just beyond me! wait 5 s say You sorcerers require extra help learning this... rather simple spell. wait 5 s say And you'll get none of it for me, because I have better things to do. end else sigh wait 3 s say Yes, yes, a wonderful spell, how incredible we illusionists are, certainly. wait 3 s roll wait 3 s say Why don't you go bash some poor rodents' heads in.  Or whatever it is you do. end
